control_attributes.control_description: The organization ensures that software and data employed during information system component and service refreshes are obtained from [Assignment: organization-defined trusted sources].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization implements non-persistent [Assignment: organization-defined information system components and services] that are initiated in a known state and terminated [Selection (one or more): upon end of session of use; periodically at [Assignment: organization-defined frequency]].

Control Statement: The organization ensures that software and data employed during information system component and service refreshes are obtained from [Assignment: organization-defined trusted sources].
